text: Natiq Aghaami oglu Aliyev () (November 23, 1947 â€“ June 9, 2017) was an Azerbaijani politician. He served as the president of the State Oil Company of Azerbaijan Republic and was the Minister of Industry and Energy of Azerbaijan Republic at the time of his death. Aliyev died on June 9, 2017 in Istanbul from heart failure after suffering a heart attack the week before in Baku. He was 69 years old. ==References== Category:1947 births Category:2017 deaths Category:Deaths from heart failure Category:New Azerbaijan Party politicians Category:Politicians from Baku Category:20th-century Azerbaijani people
title: Natig Aliyev
